Played game, wasted money in game.

Sold character. The person who bought my character quit after 4 months.

Regret.

MIR4 is basically a peaceful crafting simulator‚Ä¶ until 49 other players show up to murder you for loot. You can spend hours hunting, gathering, and making potions, or jump straight into massive 50-player raids and castle sieges where betrayal is as common as loot drops. The classes are solid‚Äîwarrior swings big swords, sorcerer nukes everything, Taoist heals your incompetent friends, and the lancer is basically a mobile Swiss Army knife. Stunning graphics, fluid combat, and a free-for-all loot system that turns friendly encounters into chaos. 10/10, I‚Äôve never felt simultaneously zen and terrified while farming mushrooms.
Love it so much, but there's too much items, I don't understand what im gonna do with it
flexible grinding mmorpg, its a great game for me as i like pvp games
its still fun game to play but only if they fixed the anti-cheat system it would be fantastic
I started this game to check if i can get money from it 4 years ago, but what can i say... it has its magic that keeps you playing, Ijust play for fun rn
Latest Update caused issues for PC/Laptop users via Steam... is there any fix for it ?
this game is very2 good, nice model and good RPG for me to grind everyday

Solid MMORPG with stunning graphics and a surprisingly engaging storyline. Leveling up is fun, and there are plenty of activities to keep you busy. It is a good choice for casual and hardcore players.

negative.review: Jogo extremamente repetitivo, assets repetidos ad infinitum apenas com sprites diferentes, hist√≥ria inexistente, combate extremamente simplista, poucas classes, poucas skills, etc.
pay to win vigorously ....
Mobile trash
rarely loads
its not a game, its just playing by itselt.. its like buying a paperweight and calling it a game. what is the point in that
this game is a no lifer, eats your entire time. and everything here is an RNG. i bet developer is like to casino.
Jogo extremamente repetitivo, assets repetidos ad infinitum apenas com sprites diferentes, hist√≥ria inexistente, combate extremamente simplista, poucas classes, poucas skills, etc.

listen to the reviews, they're all true. Also, the player limit thing is pathetic. You mean to tell me they didn't put a limit to each server and instead of making more servers, they jam pack everyone into countable servers and they will just be full most of, if not all, the time.
Have to create an account before you can play.. When you start the game from Steam. And yes, you can LINK up with STEAM. Bad programming..
Braindead game, play this if you don't know what to do with your life. Crypto/NFT garbage, but at least it's got jiggly boobs, but more than likely here to harvest my data for the CCP.

Gameplay was boring. Also, female avatar options come with terrible choices for outfits and armor (i.e., too revealing, obviously sexualized, would not function as armor, and overall worse than any clothing options for male avatars).
Never mind that this is free mobile trash on your PC, after a 500MB steam download you have to patch it for 11.7 GB! I hate it when games do this shit.
game was good until Chinese bots ruin every chance to mine
